package.name: staubli_tx2_60_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Staubli TX2-60 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Staubli TX2-60 manipulators. This includes the TX2-60 and the TX2-60L.

Joint limits, torque limits, and maximum joint velocities are based on the information in the Staubli Robotics - TX2 series 60 family - Instruction Manual version D28082802D â€“ 01/12/2016. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise (ie: no support for high speed joints, extended / limited motion ranges or other options).
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
NB (1): Masses, center of mass and moments of inertia are missing.

NB (2): In order to allow maximum torque on axis 6, effort limit on axis 5 was set to 8 Nm, rather than a feasible 10 Nm if torque on axis 6 = 0 Nm (see superscripts (1) and (2) from table in Section 2.6.2 -Torque Limits- of the instruction manual for details).

package.author: Romana Rust (ETH Zurich)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
